headline: $22.3 Billion Cold Chain Monitoring Market Outlook, 2030, Featuring 55 Companies Including Emerson Electric Company, Daikin Industries, Aeris Communications
summary: Key market opportunities include enhanced demand for efficient IoT-driven solutions in managing temperature-sensitive goods across the pharmaceutical and food industries.
